title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB:
a. The buttons in the dialog are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
e. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cutoff.
f. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB:
The buttons in the dialog should be appropriately sized.
The dialog should come up with a selected table entry.
The preview should show the complete parameter name.
The dialog should be a reasonable size for methods with many parameters.
